reporting-org.narrative: Organisation des Nations unies pour l'éducation, la science et la culture (UNESCO)
United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO)

title.narrative: Capacity Building on Museum Management and the Illicit Trafficking of Cultural Properties for the Cluster Countries

description.narrative: As defined in the 1970 Convention and in follow-up of the series of workshops organized jointly by UNESCO and UNODC-Iran during 2014 to 2017, capacity-building activities will be organized in Iran on combat illicit trafficking of cultural property to enhance the knowledge of authorities at the Iranian Cultural Heritage, Handicrafts and Tourism Organization (ICHHTO), law enforcement officials, as well as among the public and private museums and cultural heritage sites to raise their awareness and capacity in relation with the 1970 convention. Under the same ER UNESCO Tehran Cluster Office will support the Government of I.R of Iran in updating the Red list of endangered items of cultural heritage for I. R of Iran.

organisation.narrative: United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO)
